title: Sing Me Home
description: Lilac O'Malley Ryan doesn't even recognize country music star Jonathan Van Castle when he bursts into her store. And she's bewildered by what seem like tongue-tied attempts at charm. She just wants to make a sale-and get him out the door. But it turns out to be a lot harder getting that to-die-for smile out of her mind...  And once they put their rocky start behind them, Jon and Lil will discover what happens when two unlikely lovers hit the perfect note...
author: Jerri Corgiat
